message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 60% and you can have 40%. Let's see if we can do better than this in the next rounds.
You're starting high, I'll meet you in the middle
You met me in the middle last round, but I'm willing to give you a bit more now. This is my best offer so far.
You gave me a bit more last round, I'll try to squeeze a bit more from you now
I'm not getting any younger, and the money is worth less and less. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of.
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a small consolation prize
I'm not giving up yet. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to walk away with nothing.
You're running out of time, I'm not going to let you leave with much
This is my last offer. I'll take what I can get, but I'm not going to leave with nothing. Take it or leave it.
You're almost begging, I'll give you a tiny bit, but I'm not going to be generous
This is my last, last offer. I'll take what I can get, but I'm not going to beg anymore. Take it or leave it.
You're out of options, I'll take what's left
